Parameter.name: numNodesX
Parameter.docString: Number of local nodes in X direction

Parameter.name: numNodesY
Parameter.docString: Number of local nodes in Y direction

Parameter.name: numProcsX
Parameter.docString: Number of processors in X direction

Parameter.name: numProcsY
Parameter.docString: Number of processors in Y direction

Parameter.name: Report Type
Parameter.docString: Indicates the type of output from the program
